snippet.title: XDefiant: Season One Reveal | Ubisoft Forward
snippet.description:
Fresh from Ubisoft Forward, here's a sneak peek just SOME of what's to come in Season 1. New maps, New Mode: Capture The Flag, and did we mention a new Faction? GSK from Team Rainbow joins the fray when the new season drops July 2! 
 
Download for Free at playxdefiant.com/download_och
 
Watch the XDefiant Game Overview here:   https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=axDcjinoqo4&t=0s
 
 Check out the Maps and Modes here:   https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=MKUQ4pbbp-c&t=0s
 
 View the Seasonal Roadmap here:   https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=DTZJ7KTbYSw&t=0s

An Audio Described version of this segment is available on YouTube here: https://youtu.be/bTWFoRLxMEU?t=3108! We hope all players enjoy this content. #UbiForward #AudioDescription #A11y
 
About XDefiant:
Ubisoft's worlds collide in a free-to-play, first-person arena shooter where you compete to be the best in fast-paced online matches! 

Join an always-evolving experience with regular updates bringing new playable factions and a growing collection of maps, weapons, and game modes. With cross-play, you will be able to join your friends across available platforms.

#Ubisoft #XDefiant #UbiForward

About Ubisoft:
Ubisoft is a creator of worlds, committed to enriching players’ lives with original and memorable entertainment experiences. Ubisoft’s global teams create and develop a deep and diverse portfolio of games, featuring brands such as Assassin’s Creed®, Brawlhalla®, For Honor®, Far Cry®, Tom Clancy’s Ghost Recon®, Just Dance®, Rabbids®, Tom Clancy’s Rainbow Six®, The Crew® and Tom Clancy’s The Division®. Through Ubisoft Connect, players can enjoy an ecosystem of services to enhance their gaming experience, get rewards and connect with friends across platforms. With Ubisoft+, the subscription service, they can access a growing catalog of more than 100 Ubisoft games and DLC. For the 2023-24 fiscal year, Ubisoft generated net bookings of €2.32 billion. To learn more, please visit: www.ubisoftgroup.com.

© 2024 Ubisoft Entertainment. All Rights Reserved. Ubisoft and the Ubisoft logo are registered trademarks in the US and/or other countries.
